data.eml:eml: Annotated catalogue of the Haliplidae of China with the description of a new species and new records from China (Coleoptera, Adephaga)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jia, Fenglong, Vondel, Bernhard van (2011): Annotated catalogue of the Haliplidae of China with the description of a new species and new records from China (Coleoptera, Adephaga). ZooKeys 133: 1-17, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.133.1642, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.133.1642
